fields.label: Message
fields.message: Accordions are great tools used to consolidate and organize information. They help to visually reduce the amount of information on a page.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: If you're looking to drop basic information into a page, this is your layout.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Why use bullet lists when you have cards? Cards are great for highlighting benefits, features, or general information about a particular product, service, or membership.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: The faithful, good ole' call to action. If there's an action you want the visitor to take, look no further.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: If you have something to show off, why not create a gallery?

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Heros are used to place large amounts of emphasis to a particular message. Use sparingly.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Listings help you to display a list of just about anything that lets a user browse, search, and filter what they are looking for.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: A slider is a versatile tool used to display features, reviews, testimonials, and more.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Well, it doesn't get any geekier than this. Show em' whatcha got!

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Layouts are the building blocks of each page. Each layout stacks and does something unique. Think of legos when you think of layouts. Tip: As your page grows, collapse layouts to focus on a particular layout. To collapse, click anywhere across the top of the layout bar.
